name: Feeling empty today
description:
You are inside your own brain!

Your goal is to produce exactly those feelings that you need right now. Just combine clay with the correct color to produce eyes, mouth and head of an emoji that represents this feeling.

But take care! Do not fall into the deepness of your own mind. That would tike time and time is required to get the right feelings before you go crazy.

Controls

  • WASD / Arrow Keys: Movement
  • Shift: Dash
  • Space: Pick Up / Drop / Interact
  • Esc: Pause / Menu

Hints

Each producer needs clay. Mixed with a color, it creates an emoji component. For instance, the head producer crafts a head using clay and any color.

Each emoji consists of a head, a mouth and eyes.

How is this a roguelike?

The levels are procedurally generated and become harder over time. If the time is up and you did not finish crafting all feelings, you lose. That's it. Everything is lost.
